channel.title: Hi, Chris from UK here
channel.description:
Hi, Just joined the forum. Been boostrapping for the past 5 years, still haven't quite got there. Our first proper SaaS app launched earlier this June clienform and we're just looking at finding the product market fit as well as the best sales channels. Now looking at 2 new ideas, rocketproof and pricingrocket both in early validation stage and both aimed at fellow bootstrappers. Gonna post a request for feedback on the two new ideas once I can post links :slight_smile:
Also looking forward to sharing and helping out others.

item.title: Hi, Chris from UK here
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Welcome, Chris!

Would you like to post the request for feedback already? I think by now you should be able to post links.

Read full topic
